subject: Track and Field
Olympic Games (2012)
lead_paragraph: Sally Pearson of Australia, the 100-meter hurdles silver medalist in 2008, won gold. The Americans Dawn Harper, Kellie Wells and Lolo Jones swept the next three places.
snippet: Sally Pearson of Australia, the 100-meter hurdles silver medalist in 2008, won gold. The Americans Dawn Harper, Kellie Wells and Lolo Jones swept the next three places.
